story.storykicker: Check out what the stars say your day will be like today.
story.storybody:
ARIES{mosimage}

Your head and heart pull you in different directions when you need to make a decision. Your heart and intuition provide you with the best answers. Personal relationships and family are supportive but there can be a temporary separation that causes some pain. Lucky number 5. Colour green.

TAURUS{mosimage}

Trust rather than doubt your own wisdom, especially in matters of business and finances! Two people at work are supportive and enhance productive work today. Don't look for answers outside but turn within to find them! Yoga and meditation are recommended. Lucky number 3. Colour saffron.

GEMINI{mosimage}

A positive and detached attitude helps to turn relationships around in a surprising way. Disruption at work is temporary, as there is an acceleration of profit and production at the end of the day. Visit your doctor, as health problems should not be neglected. Lucky number 7. Colour blue.

CANCER{mosimage}

Remain aware in professional matters and financial dealings. This is a good time to encounter old relationships and make a breakthrough. Balance in all areas of life is recommended. A Scorpio person gives you valuable insights. Listen to your own good judgment. Lucky number 7. Colour gray.

LEO{mosimage}

Your head is in the clouds and there is lightness to your step that leaves a lasting impact on people around you. You are generous with friends. You draw attention at a meeting while expressing dynamic ideas. The Arts and theatre are inviting and involving. Lucky number is 11. Colour yellow.

VIRGO{mosimage}

Avoid hurried action and judgment as they lead to chaos. Your head and heart pull you in different directions when decisions have to be taken. Your participation is needed in family affairs. New beginnings in personal and professional aspects are likely! Lucky number 4. Colour green.

LIBRA{mosimage}

Energies are finally tuned and balanced in all partnerships for you to achieve professional success, happiness and wellbeing. Communications and visitors from overseas can be expected. Continuous professional and social activity can be exhausting. Avoid stress. Lucky number 9. Colour blue.

SCORPIO{mosimage}

Things at work are not as bad as they seem today - be realistic and positive. Personal relationships are loving and supportive. Two separate situations are likely to demand your attention and energy today. Make clear decisions rather than procrastinate. Lucky number is 10. Colour red.

SAGITTARIUS{mosimage}

You maintain your individuality and self-esteem in personal relationships by winning in a competitive situation. You are giving in intimate relationships and stand by family in troubled waters. Friends and family depend on your wisdom and good counsel. Lucky number 4. Colour yellow.

CAPRICORN{mosimage}

You are sensitive and creative and need to maintain equilibrium! New developments and people could throw you off. Partnerships of any kind should be treated with care. Peace and compromise in conflicts are on the cards! Keep an eye on finances and health. Lucky number 8. Colour pink.

AQUARIUS{mosimage}

When you are presented with personal choices and options, it is a good idea to first look at your priorities and then make decisions. Some choices can be put on hold till you are clear and total within. Love and romance are on the cards! Trust your intuition. Lucky number 20. Colour blue.

PISCES{mosimage}

Surprises are on the cards today. A business opportunity helps you make a progressive change. Love and romance blossom as personal relationships are rejuvenated. Since this is a day of happenings, just sit back and watch the magic in your life unfolding. Lucky number 6. Colour ebony.
